title: 820-00840 dont power on 20V on charger
message:
Hi guys, I have this board 820-00840 with 20V 0.01a , no water damage, no corrosion . Any help

Some measures

PPBUS_G3H. 0.4v
PP3V3_G3H. 0v
PP3V3_UPC_XB_LDO. 3.3V
PP3V3_UPC_XB 0v

no short on PPBUS

title: 820-00840 dont power on 20V on charger
message:
Very strange to get 20V without 3V3_G3H.
BTW, test the board alone on the desk, without battery connected.
And post accurate information.

title: 820-00840 dont power on 20V on charger
message:
Do not quote an entire post, visible few centimeters above?
Please, maintain forum aesthetic.

Are you really get 20V on USB-C meter with 0V at PPBUS_G3H???
Using original charger?

title: 820-00840 dont power on 20V on charger
message: ok sorry, well whit 87w charger i got 20v and 0a but with 61w charger F3010 shows 5v 0v and 5V again

title: 820-00840 dont power on 20V on charger
message:
87W charger is fake?

So 61W cycles 5-0-5V?
Both ports, in both directions have the same behaviour?
Be aware, charger can be connected in 4 ways, 2 for each port.

Check for short on all secondary supplies.

title: 820-00840 dont power on 20V on charger
message: Both ports and 4 ways same issue, when you say secondary supplies do you mean s3,s4,s0?

title: 820-00840 dont power on 20V on charger
message:
Yes, start checking at big coils.
Don't forget to check behind power FETs.

Also post exact diode mode to ground at PPBUS_G3H and 3V3_G3H.

title: 820-00840 dont power on 20V on charger
message:
diode mode

PPBUS_G3h 0.459
PP3V3_G3H.  0.377

no short on big coils again with another 61w charger got 20v 0.01a

title: 820-00840 dont power on 20V on charger
message:
Do you get 3V3_S5, when switch to 20V?
Any other coil gets voltage then?
